contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|suffix|Appendix:Suffixes}} A '''[[suffix]]''' is part of a word; an affix that follows the morphemes to which it can attach. '''Suffix''' may also refer to: * [[Suffix (name)]], the style at the end of a person's name which gives additional identifying information about the person * [[Suffix (computer science)]], the last part of a string of characters * Suffix notation, a notation for manipulating vector quantities, also known as [[index notation]] * [[Suffix array]], an array of integers giving the starting positions of suffixes of a string in lexicographical order * [[Suffix tree]], a data structure that presents the suffixes of a given string in a way that allows for a particularly fast implementation of many important string operations == See also == * [[Prefix]] * [[Infix]] * [[Derivation (linguistics)]] * [[Wiktionary:Appendix:Suffixes:English]] {{disambiguation}}
